entry.data:
CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 50

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
